author: randy
post: Am I missing something here? My understanding is that while the scorches on the Shroud from the various fire related events fluoresce, the image itself does not. See V.D.Miller and S.F.Pellicori, J.Biol.Photograph.Assoc., 49 (1981) 71. I’m assuming the Sciencebod “hot statue” images would fluoresce, and therefore cannot be the way the Shroud image was formed..
title: A new “theory” for how the Turin Shroud was faked
